original_title: O.J. Fitness: Minimum Maintenance Fitness for Men
overview: Put some juice into your health and fitness program as O.J. Simpson guides you through his personal approach to getting and staying in shape – "Minimum Maintenance Fitness For Men". For men with tight schedules who feel they don't have time to go to a gym, can't lose a few stubborn pounds, or feel stressed out at work – this one hour video is your heart-pumping, calorie-burning, total exercise program. Based on a series of articles from PLAYBOY magazine, this comprehensive, first-of-its-kind exercise and lifestyle video is the ideal way to fit fitness and  nutrition into your life at home, at work, and on the road.
title: O.J. Fitness: Minimum Maintenance Fitness for Men
